description: This course offers an introduction to grammar and reading through oral and written work, supplemented by reading of graded Russian prose. Prerequisite: Russian Language and Area Studies 111 or equivalent.
name: Beginning Russian II
notes: Students in Russian 112 must also register for one lab Russian 112 AL or BL.
prerequisites: Russian Language and Area Studies 111 or equivalent.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Russian Language and Area Studies 111 or equivalent.
